caption: They have a large variety of draught beer, very few featuring flavors of fruit or the nutty honey that I love. However, the owner was a very friendly man willing to answer questions about the menu, generously handing out samples.  They also …
Best place in Hamilton...period 🥰
Friendly!

I really enjoyed this place. The ladies behind the bar were nice and helpful. The bar is in a gentrified part of Hamilton that is really coming back to life. Parking wasnt bad and was free. The menu is very large but the quality of the food …
Beer selection is good, beer cheese is good. The ants on the bar not so good. Good for snack and quick beer.
Walked in, didn’t get greeted. Instead I got greeted with “ LAST CALL PEOPLE LASST CALL “ . Walked out .
Loaded sidewinders are AWESOME. No review on beer, gave up drinking it. Nice neighborhood establishment
Always a favorite when in Ohio

I’ve been a patron at Casual Pint Hamilton for the past 6 months and it is one of my favorites. We most often visit for brews but the tasty pretzels and beer cheese are hard to resist. They also have a great selection of packaged beer to …
The Casual Pint is doing great work for the growth of Hamilton's downtown.  They are doing everything they possibly can to make it a great spot!

Not bad , not great. Service is great except for the hostile greeting of "YOU NEED TO WEAR A MASK IF YOU STAND UP". I said "you can assume I have a medical condition" and that was the end of that. There is really no need for that. And don't …
Staff always attentive friendly and knowledgeable
Very clean.  Enjoyed the decor.  Burger was good on pretzel bun. Excellent selection of beverages.  Great spot to meet up with friends.
Great variety of beer on tap and packages available. The shrimp & sidewinders are now my crave food.
Bartender was friendly and knowledgeable. Good selection, no domestics though. Cool place.
Very crowded
Great selections!
Fabulous draft list!
Great place and great staff.
Good beer. Nice people.

New bar and grill in Hamilton Ohio. They had good live music outdoors on Sunday after noon. We didn't eat here but had beers and enjoyed sitting outside and listening to music. Hamilton is doing a good job bringing life back to the downtown.
Lots of good beer.

Amazing place to stop by and get a drink. Super friendly staff who will make sure you are treated well and they will let you sample before you commit to buying a beer. Also had some amazing food. Would recommend.
Great beer selection and additional seating outside in parking lot!
Best ever. Lovely selection, lovely staff.

I order food from this place in person. I was told I would be about 10 min. I told the young lady that I would be back. I live at the Marcum so,  I went home and made a drink,  put it in a Dora cup then,  headed back to the bar. I walk in …
fantastic food, beer, and atmosphere!  highly recommend
Food leaves much to be desired. Probably a good place to drink after dinner somewhere else.

5/5 stars for me, everything that is happening for downtown Hamilton is pure excellence this place included. Sitting in the heart of the DORA district this tap house offers an excellent rotating craft selection with a lot of local options …

Got take out last night. Food was good except for the wings. We go 2 orders of them. The food was to be ready in 20 minutes and got order in 30 minutes. Wings weren't cooked enough. Skin was very rubbery. All the food was hot. They just rushed the wings
Great environment and great beer choices
Great place and service was excellent.

This place is awesome!! Decent prices on everything, and I have a great time every time I go. The guy that host trivia night every Tuesday is hilarious and super nice!! Definitely recommend to anyone who will listen!!
Great place to stay
Donavan is fantastic!  Very knowledgeable and wonderful service!
One of the best brew pubs in Hamilton; the selection is amazing.
Parker rocks! Remembers the patrons and always has such a sweet smile!
PARKER is the best beer tender Eva!!! Makes sure the pour is to the top! She is the best!!!!
Heather ALWAYS makes it feel like we are at the CHEERS of Hamilton! We love coming here not just for the fantastic selection of beer, but the fun environment as well!
I love coming here! Heather is always so warm and friendly. she always knows the beer I like!
Nice place. Good food. Lots of beer choices
Great wait staff! Very helpful and friendly!  Shoutout to Donovan 💪🏻

Great place to have a casual bite with a huge tap selection.  But the best part was Donovan!  His expert knowledge of the tap selection helped us hone in the perfect beers for our party!  We'll be back!

I’m shocked. Normally if you ask the server for recommendations they look at you cross eyed 😵 but here our server asked what our favorite beers are and then brought us samples of what he thought we would love......nailed it!
Go see Heather at casual pint! She is Amazing!

Clearly this establishment has focused on hiring staff that has an interest in providing knowledgeable and  capable employees to serve their patrons. The pretzels and the homemade beer cheese were incredible! Much improved from our first visit which wasn’t that bad, but so much better this time. Well done! Highly recommend!
Great time. Trivia on Tuesday nights is awesome! The service sitting at the bar was exceptional.

Outstanding. Donavin is a terrific beer-ambassador and all around engaging fella. He is confident on his beer offerings and can handily pair you with one or two you will enjoy! Come out and ask for him, he will take great care of you!
What a great place!  Stopped in for the first time today and had a great experience.  Heather was very informative about all the beers on tap and made sure we were well taken care of!
Love these places! Great revolving taps, they will put anything in the cooler in a glass for you too!
Great beer selection and great customer service!
Had a wonderful time. Great food and very friendly staff. Will be back.
Wondeful spot for a bite and a beer. Very large selection.
Great place for a beer, they have a large selection.
Great beers, great food, great bartenders!
Nice little meeting place.
Great atmosphere  lacking on the food selection...

Great attention to the customer! we stopped in for lunch and my wife and I were asked to try some new sample craft beers that they were planning to tap the next day and we learned a lot about brewing beer during that short time. Very enjoyable atmosphere! We will be back!!! This is a big plus for Hamilton.
Great beer selection. Did not try the food, but will be back to do so. Staff very friendly.
Great beers and a big variety,
Everything was great until we left and was chased outside asking if we paid our tab!  Tacky!!!!  Know your patrons!
Always a great place to go for a pint after training!
Great place, good selection of beers.
Good food and beer selection

Beer choices were abundant, food was good  however the service was slow and almost obsolete. 6 warm bodies behind the bar and we had to wrestle one to stop to ask for napkins, silverware and beer refills. It’s 4:00 and slow so I would not recommend arriving during the busy hours.
Nice atmosphere.  A mix up with my food but the manager Cody took care of it.  Great flat bread! Would definitely recommend!

Absolutely love the Casual Pint - Hamilton.  Awesome beer selections and the food is great.  Can’t rave enough about how amazing the staff is.  Heather, Nicole, Amanda, Olivia, and Cody know how to take care of customers and really make …
Nicole 19/10  Amanda 17/10 Cody 15/10. Amazing bar staff, good beer! I'll be back tomorrow!!!
Great beer section
Good food. Lots of beers. Be ready! Clean and the bar tender, fun!
Food is delicious! The staff is very friendly & knowledgeable about all the different drafts.

We got the opportunity to stop by on Saturday 10/12. We did have to wait a moment for a seat. Which is a normal thing for a Saturday night bar with a festival going on. We were immediately greeted once we sat. We had many drink options …
Nice place. Service wasn't very good as far as checking up on our table. We had the go to the bar to check out. It was because of this that we decided not to bother ordering food.
New taproom.  Many of the local craft brews on tap.  Nice.  Near the outdoor concert park.
Great atmosphere. Lots of beer choices and food is good too.

I sat down at the bar. Five persons were behind the bar talking to each other checking their cell phones. No one waited on me. I asked the guy next to me and he said waited fifteen minutes and finally waived one of the servers down. I …

The food was delicious and the space is clean and carefully laid out.  However, the kitchen seems totally inadequate for the menu they’re selling.  Went for lunch with 5 on a Friday afternoon and the first thing we were told was “we have a …

I met some friends there. It was the first visit for all of us. It was a really cool place. There was seating inside and out. They had a nice selection of things to eat and the food was excellent. They had a very nice selection of alcoholic …

Always have a good selection of beer.  Food is good and  Staff is amazing.    Andy and his crew never disappoint when you are in.    Have a friend in a wheelchair and they make it possible for him to come by himself.   Support this local business!    Hamilton is lucky to have them here
The server Amanda was knowledgeable about beer and patient with me while making a decision. The food was great and speed of service very good. I have been a few times now.
Just as good as the location on Tylersville Road
Took forever to get food and drinks. By the time we got our food it was cold. If you ask me, this place is overrated.
Dentist office vibe, slow service and overall disoriented flow.
Great Craft beer bar that also has some food
Awsome time great crowd and good food + beer
Food was good. Service was slow. Would probably try it again sometime
They have a massive amount of craft beers to choose from. I had the pretzels with beer cheese and and a brat and both were very delicious. The staff was friendly and helpful in picking out beers.
Casual Pint is the Perfect name! Young and old all come to meet!!
We didn't ear food but, the beer selection and service was good. Nicole was personable and ready to answer any question.
Love it! Great food, friendly staff and awesome variety of craft beers .
Stopped in for lunch with friends. Service was friendly and attentive. All of us enjoyed our food. Will definitely return.

A great place with a nice laid back atmosphere. Excellent selection of craft beers. And even a nice craft soda selection in the bottle. Food is good. Owners and staff are very nice. I'll definitely be back.
Love it!!

Atmosphere was great, all staff engaged, no one standing around on their phone. Kitchen was very slow, food was really good. They will get better. Not been open long. I am not a craft beer drinker. Lots of people enjoying many flavors.
Awesome Food, great service.  Loved the atmosphere and I don't even drink!
Great beer selection, good pub food..They just opened give them a try
Had an excellent time here! Service has improved dramatically since the first time I visited. Will definitely be visiting again soon!

Uneven service and mediocre food. I was intensely ignored for several minutes upon arrival. I finally was served but they seemed not to really understand the fundamentals of serving food and drink or even human interaction/social cues. …

Love the casual pint! Beer selection is amazing and the food is off the charts! Great addition to Hamilton. I actually got to meet the owners and they were the best. I would recommend the casual pint to anyone that wants a great beer and even better food! Dan and Anne Marie, you guys rock!

Stopped in with another couple for food and drinks.  Ordered chips and salsa for an  appetizer.   Ordered beers, and waters with lemons.  The waitress brings out one beer at a time. We had to ask 2 more times for the waters and 3 more times …

Drink menu, fantastic. Food, not so much. $9 for an appetizer smaller than a side. Full menu but the server said the kitchen isn't equipped for multiple food orders at once. So, great place for a drink. Not much more.

First time there. never been to a place that was so confused. You walk in, no sign or host to tell you to seat yourself. Waited forever to get service. Then being a non beer drinker they don't server alcohol other than wine, so I tried to …

Would be no stars if that were a choice.  They have no idea what they are doing.  We waited an hour for potato skins!!!!!....then they brought our food out one at a time so like we were 3 people and one of us got their food and ate it all …
Awful should be called confused  pint
Great food, great beer!
Owners are amazing.  Wide variety of draft beers to choose from.  Food is great as well.
